SampleType.description: Use sampletypes_folder_uid with action create and sampletype_uid with action update

fields.name: RetentionDays
fields.description: How long a sample of this type can be retained

fields.name: title
fields.description: The name of this sample type

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief description of this sample type

fields.name: Prefix
fields.description: A short code that will identify this sample type

fields.name: MinimumVolume
fields.description: The absolute minimum amount that can be selected for a sample of this type

fields.name: Hazardous
fields.description: One or zero indicating if this sample is dangerous or not

Sample.description: Use project_uid with action create and sample_uid with action update

fields.name: LinkedSample
fields.description: The uid of the parent Sample that this sample belongs to

fields.name: Project
fields.description: The uid of the project that this sample will belong to

fields.name: SampleType
fields.description: The uid or the title of the sample type that this sample will belong to such as  Whole Blood or 4dd3a41560934613924b98dcbb5b7e5f

fields.name: Barcode
fields.description: The barcode that uniquely identifies this sample

fields.name: StoragePosition
fields.description: The uid of the storage position that the sample will be stored in

fields.name: Volume
fields.description: The collected amount of the sample

fields.name: Unit
fields.description: The unit in which volume is measured for example ml

fields.name: APISource
fields.description: Used by some sources to identify themselves for special processing for example Azzizi will specify odk

StorageUnit.description: Create storage unit(s) for eg. Room, Freezer, Shelf, etc.

fields.name: portal_type
fields.description: A unique value can be assigned to portal_type and must be 'StorageUnit' .

fields.name: department
fields.description: The department where the storage unit is located

fields.name: temperature
fields.description: The temperature of the storage unit.

fields.name: prefix
fields.description: Prefix of the IDs and Titles of the storage units. This will be appended with leading_zeros

fields.name: leading_zeros
fields.description: leading_zeros are used to construct the ids of the storage units. Eg. 00 for 2 zeros.

fields.name: seq_start
fields.description: Id start number

fields.name: number_items
fields.description: Number of storage units to create.

fields.name: parent_path
fields.description: parent folder path. Eg. storage/Room-001

fields.name: portal_type
fields.description: A unique value can be assigned to portal_type and must be 'ManagedStorage' .

fields.name: prefix
fields.description: Prefix of the IDs and Titles of the boxes. This will be appended with leading_zeros

fields.name: leading_zeros
fields.description: leading_zeros are used to construct the IDs of the boxes. Eg. 00 for 2 zeros.

fields.name: seq_start
fields.description: Id start number

fields.name: number_items
fields.description: Number of boxes to create.

fields.name: parent_path
fields.description: parent folder path. Eg. storage/Room-001

fields.name: number_positions
fields.description: Number of positions in a box.

fields.name: x_axis
fields.description: Number of columns of the box 2D graphic representation.

fields.name: y_axis
fields.description: Number of rows of the box 2D graphic representation.

fields.name: portal_type
fields.description: A unique value can be assigned to portal_type and must be 'UnmanagedStorage' .

fields.name: prefix
fields.description: Prefix of the IDs and Titles of the storage. This will be appended with leading_zeros

fields.name: leading_zeros
fields.description: leading_zeros are used to construct the IDs of the storage. Eg. 00 for 2 zeros.

fields.name: seq_start
fields.description: Id start number

fields.name: number_items
fields.description: Number of storage to create.

fields.name: parent_path
fields.description: parent folder path. Eg. storage/Room-001
